snippet.title: Time Trap - Hidden Objects (Steam Game Trailer)
snippet.description:
BELONGPLAY | Заходите к нам в гости: 
• https://belongplay.ru
• https://vk.com/belongplay
• https://telegram.me/belongplay
• https://steamcommunity.com/groups/belongplay
• https://fb.com/belongplay
• https://instagram.com/belongplay
• https://twitter.com/belongplay

You set off on a journey around an abandoned town to unravel a mystery of a missing journalist. A unique post-apocalyptic atmosphere and realistic graphics, ambient music, puzzles and mini-games will make your adventure unforgettable.
